header.title: Veileder for valgobservatører i Norge - regjeringen.no

body.p: The Ministry of Local Government and Regional Development has drawn up guidelines for election observation in Norway. The brochure contains both Norwegian and English text. It provides information about the procedure for applying for accreditation, what can be observed during elections, and the “Code of conduct for observers”.

list.p: Guidelines for election observers in Norway Publication no.: H-2235 (pdf-format)
